content: Sadako voleva dire di pi√π, ma bocca e lingua non volevano saperne di muoversi.
translations: eng:Sadako wanted to add more, but her mouth just didn't want to open enough to make the words anymore
eng:Sadako wanted to say more, but her lips just didn't want to move anymore
eng:Sadako wanted to say more, but her mouth and tongue wouldn't move
